title: News: CitR Wins Best Blog At Record of the Day Awards 2012
body:
Without blowing our own trumpet, we’re stoked to announce that last night_** Crack in the Road**_ won ‘Best Blog’ at the annual Record of the Day Awards.

It’s truly an honour to be recognised alongside the likes of [Pitchfork](http://pitchfork.com/), [The 405](http://thefourohfive.com/) and [The Line of Best Fit](http://www.thelineofbestfit.com/), as well as a host of fantastic journalists, publications and PR firms.

At the risk of sounding self-indulgent, it feels great to be recognised for the hard work we all put in, and more importantly, for the passion that we attempt to inject into the blog. The thought that anyone besides my mum and a few close friends read these ramblings is rather humbling, and slightly bizarre. Hopefully this award will provide increased exposure to the brilliant acts that we feature on these pages. Thank you so much for your votes and continued support, we hope you’ll continue with us on this journey. Remember, keep the love for the music.

Check out the full list of winners below. (Thanks to [LOBF](http://www.thelineofbestfit.com/news/latest-news/record-of-the-day-awards-announce-2012-winners-113733))

Best Music Writer (voted by students): [**Alexis Petridis**](http://www.guardian.co.uk/profile/alexispetridis)  
Best Publication (voted by students): [**Pitchfork**](http://www.pitchfork.com/)  
Best Student Music Writer (judged by a panel): **[Sam Briggs](https://twitter.com/sambriggs) **– York University  
Best In-House PR Person: **Duncan Jordan** – [Bella Union](http://bellaunion.com/)  
Best Online Content: [**Noisey**](http://noisey.vice.com/en_uk)  
Most Effective Music Coverage in a Newspaper: [**Guardian Guide**](http://www.guardian.co.uk/theguardian/2012/nov/24/theguide)  
Best In-House Online PR Person: **Roz Mansfield** – [Atlantic](http://atlanticrecords.com/)  
Best Music Book: Pat Long’s** [The History Of The NME](http://www.historyofnme.com/)**  
Best Blog: [**Crack in the Road **](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/)  
Feature of the Year: **Alex Marshall **at [The Stool Pigeon](http://www.thestoolpigeon.co.uk/) for his Investigation: ATP  
Best Independent Online PR Person: **Debbie Ball** – [Create Spark](http://www.createspark.co.uk/)  
Idea or Innovation Award: [**405**](http://thefourohfive.com/) – Discovery  
Most Effective PR Campaign for a Live Event or Festival: [**Cornerstone Agency**](http://www.cornerstonepromotion.com/) for Converse Represent at the 100 Club  
Communications Person of the Year: **Adam White** – [UMI](http://umi/)  
Live Reviews: Writer of the Year: **Simon Price **– [The Independent On Sunday](http://www.independent.co.uk/)  
Best Independent PR Person: **Adrian Read** – [Inside/Out](http://www.insideslashout.com/)  
Business Writer of the Year: **Eamonn Forde **  
Record Reviews: Writer of the Year: **Alexis Petridis **– [The Guardian](http://www.guardian.co.uk/)  
Most Effective Breaking Music Writer of the Year: **Matt Wilkinson** at [NME](http://www.nme.com/)  
Best PR Campaign for a Reissue: [**RMP**](https://www.facebook.com/pages/RMP-Music/343926702330748) and [**EMI**](http://www.emimusic.com/) for Blur – 21  
Digital Publication of the Year: [**The Line of Best Fit **](http://www.thelineofbestfit.com/)  
Best In-House PR Department: [**4AD**](http://www.4ad.com/)  
Best PR Campaign for an Established Act: Bat for Lashes – **Anna Mears**, [Dog Day Press](http://dogdaypress.com/)  
Best PR Campaign for a Breakthrough Act: Alt-J – Adrian Read & Caroline Beashal, [**Inside/Out**](http://www.insideslashout.com/)  
Best Independent PR Company: [**Dawbell**](http://www.dawbell.com/)  
Editor of the Year: James McMahon – [**Kerrang!**](http://www.kerrang.com/)  
Magazine of the Year: [**Q**](http://www.qthemusic.com/)

Outstanding Contribution to Music PR: [**Regine Moylett**](http://uk.linkedin.com/pub/regine-moylett/14/861/919)  
Outstanding Contribution to Music Photography:** [Jill Furmanovsky](http://www.jillfurmanovsky.com/)**  
Outstanding Contribution to Music Journalism: **[Miranda Sawyer](http://www.mirandasawyer.com/)**
